about_the_game:
Test your knowledge of the Highway Code, challenge your friends, and discover the basics of the Highway Code for the ASSR1 / ASSR2 and the AM license!

  • Enjoy the classic multiplayer mode: up to 4 players can compete locally or online, challenge your friends!
  • With 1,300 additionally fully dubbed questions and answers, put your knowledge to the test!
  • New questions to learn the basics of traffic safety, accessible to middle schoolers: prepare your scooter licence!
  • Track your progress with a personalized training course designed for you.
  • Analyze your results, improve on your weak spots with themed series, and win trophies!
detailed_description:
DISCLAIMER: French language only

This product is based on the French Highway Code. As a result, the game content may not be fully adapted for road regulations outside of the French territory.


About the Game

Test your knowledge of the Highway Code, challenge your friends, and discover the basics of the Highway Code for the ASSR1 / ASSR2 and the AM license!

  • Enjoy the classic multiplayer mode: up to 4 players can compete locally or online, challenge your friends!
  • With 1,300 additionally fully dubbed questions and answers, put your knowledge to the test!
  • New questions to learn the basics of traffic safety, accessible to middle schoolers: prepare your scooter licence!
  • Track your progress with a personalized training course designed for you.
  • Analyze your results, improve on your weak spots with themed series, and win trophies!
